name: Svalbard Hotel

reviews.title: Clean and simple
reviews.text: It is difficult to judge this hotel given we are on the polar circle. Instead I will list its advantages and disadvantages based on general hotel standards.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: A gem in Longyearbyen
Cosy hotel. Fantastic rooms. Good atmosphere inside.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Just right

reviews.text: - very clean, the bathroom in particular
reviews.title: The second nicest place to stay in Longyearbyen...

description: Brand new Svalbard Hotel consists of 17 double rooms, including 2 handicap-friendly rooms. The hotel also offers conference facilities for small groups. The hotel is situated in the city center, only a few meters from restaurants, bars shopping center and souvenir shops. Svalbard Lodge have modern apartments located in the centre of Longyearbyen. Only a few meters from restaurants, bars, shopping centre and souvenir shops.
